name: Fragment of 'Cultes des Ghoules'
physical_description: Three charred, brittle pages bound together with gut. The French text is handwritten by a clearly unstable author.
history: Believed to be a transcription of a section from the Comte d'Erlette's infamous tome, recovered from a burned-down farmhouse outside Arkham in 1908.
content_summary: Contains rituals for communicating with ghouls and a partial description of their subterranean kingdom.
